code: import Axios from'axios';var BaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;export var PostApi=function PostApi(url){var data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};var idToken=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;return Axios({method:'POST',url:BaseUrl+url,data:data,headers:{Accept:'application/json','Access-Control-Allow-Origin':'*','Content-Type':'application/json',authorization:"Token ".concat(idToken)}}).then(function(res){return res.data;});};
